app.title: Interactive Feedback Collection
app.confirmCancelMessage: Are you sure you want to cancel feedback? All input content will be lost.
app.layoutChangeMessage:
Layout mode has been changed and requires reloading the interface to take effect.
Reload now?

about.description: A powerful MCP server that provides human-in-the-loop interactive feedback functionality for AI-assisted development tools. Supports dual interfaces (Qt GUI and Web UI) with rich features including image upload, command execution, and multi-language support.
about.contactDescription: For technical support, issue reports, or feature suggestions, feel free to contact us through Discord community or GitHub Issues.
about.thanksText:
Special thanks to the original author F√°bio Ferreira (@fabiomlferreira) for creating the original interactive-feedback-mcp project.

This enhanced version is developed and maintained by Minidoracat, who has significantly expanded the project with GUI interface, image support, multi-language capabilities, and many other improvements.

Also thanks to sanshao85's mcp-feedback-collector project for UI design inspiration.

Open source collaboration makes technology better!

feedback.title: Your Feedback
feedback.description: Please describe your thoughts, suggestions, or modifications needed for the AI's work.
feedback.placeholder:
Please enter your feedback, suggestions, or questions here...

üí° Tips:
‚Ä¢ Press Ctrl+Enter (numpad supported) to submit quickly
‚Ä¢ Press Ctrl+V to paste images from clipboard
feedback.emptyMessage: Please enter feedback content before submitting. You can describe your thoughts, suggestions, or areas that need modification.

summary.title: AI Work Summary
summary.description: Below is the work content that AI has just completed for you. Please review and provide feedback.
summary.testDescription: Below is the message content replied by AI. Please review and provide feedback.

command.title: Command Execution
command.description: You can execute commands to verify results or gather more information.

images.title: üñºÔ∏è Image Attachments (Optional)
images.dragHint: üéØ Drag images here or press Ctrl+V/Cmd+V to paste from clipboard (PNG, JPG, JPEG, GIF, BMP, WebP)
images.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove image "{filename}"?
images.paste_failed: Paste failed, no image in clipboard
images.paste_no_image: No image in clipboard to paste
images.paste_image_from_textarea: Image intelligently pasted from text area to image area

language.description: Choose your preferred interface language. Language changes take effect immediately.

language.title: Language Settings
language.description: Choose your preferred interface language. Language changes take effect immediately.

layout.title: Interface Layout
layout.description: Choose the display method for AI summary and feedback input areas
layout.separateModeDescription: AI summary and feedback are in separate tabs
layout.combinedVerticalDescription: AI summary on top, feedback input below, both on the same page
layout.combinedHorizontalDescription: AI summary on left, feedback input on right, expanding summary viewing area

window.title: Window Positioning
window.alwaysCenter: Always show window at primary screen center
window.alwaysCenterDescription: Recommended for multi-monitor setups or when experiencing window positioning issues

reset.title: Reset Settings
reset.description: Clear all saved settings and restore to default state
reset.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to reset all settings? This will clear all saved preferences and restore to default state.
reset.successMessage: All settings have been successfully reset to default values.

status.pasteFailed: Failed to get image from clipboard

errors.title: Error
errors.imageSaveEmpty: Saved image file is empty! Location: {path}
errors.confirmClearAll: Are you sure you want to clear all {count} images?
errors.fileSizeExceeded:
Image {filename} size is {size}MB, exceeding 1MB limit!
Recommend using image editing software to compress before uploading.

test.qtGuiSummary:
üéØ Image Preview and Window Adjustment Test

This is a test session to verify the following features:

‚úÖ Test Items:
1. Image upload and preview functionality
2. Image X delete button in top-right corner
3. Free window resizing
4. Flexible splitter adjustment
5. Dynamic layout of all areas
6. Smart Ctrl+V image paste functionality

üìã Test Steps:
1. Try uploading some images (drag & drop, file selection, clipboard)
2. Check if image preview displays correctly
3. Click the X button in the top-right corner of images to delete them
4. Try resizing the window, check if it can be freely adjusted
5. Drag the splitter to adjust area sizes
6. Press Ctrl+V in the text box to test smart paste functionality
7. Provide any feedback or issues found

Please test these features and provide feedback!
test.webUiSummary:
Test Web UI Functionality

üéØ **Test Items:**
- Web UI server startup and operation
- WebSocket real-time communication
- Feedback submission functionality
- Image upload and preview
- Command execution functionality
- Smart Ctrl+V image paste
- Multi-language interface switching

üìã **Test Steps:**
1. Test image upload (drag & drop, file selection, clipboard)
2. Press Ctrl+V in text box to test smart paste
3. Try switching languages (Traditional Chinese/Simplified Chinese/English)
4. Test command execution functionality
5. Submit feedback and images

Please test these features and provide feedback!
